text: hey all, i'm thinking about working on some custom modules for the marketplace and am wondering what people have on their wishlists as their most desired custom modules that don't exist
shouldn't i be able to create a module using hubl and give it a dynamic name?

` {% for r in all_rows %}`
`      {% module "{{ r.hs_id }}" title="{{ r.title }}" %}`
 `   {% endfor %}`
i get about 50 of these errors... `Error:30:0InterpretException: Widget name can only contain alpha-numeric characters; found: '{'`
i refactored out of a loop and quit using a custom module... looks like i can't even create an instrinsic tag using a dynamic name?

`{% set tag_name = "my_header" %}`
`{% header "{{ tag_name }}" value="header text" %}`
that gives me 4 of those same InterpretException errors
